unnormalised: Arre yaar, property prices in Mumbai are insane! You need like, ₹2 crore just to buy a chawl! My uncle bought a flat in Bandra back in '95 for ₹5 lakh. Now that same flat is worth ₹5 Cr. What kinda magic is this? Should have listened to my dad and invested, but no, I was busy spending all my money on chai and samosas. Now I'm stuck renting a 1BHK in Virar for ₹15,000. Sigh... maybe someday I'll own a place. Maybe when pigs fly and land on a ₹100 note.
normalised: Arre yaar, property prices in Mumbai are insane! You need like, rupee two crore just to buy a chawl! My uncle bought a flat in Bandra back in ninety five for rupee five lakh. Now that same flat is worth rupee five crore. What kind of magic is this? Should have listened to my dad and invested, but no, I was busy spending all my money on chai and samosas. Now I'm stuck renting a one B-H-K in Virar for rupee fifteen thousand. Sigh... maybe someday I'll own a place. Maybe when pigs fly and land on a rupee one hundred note.
